title: Immigration Attidudes
text: What is the expected immigration attitude of someone who is liberal and starts with an attitude of 6?

title: Immigration Attidudes
text:
Model Definition
\[y_i = \beta_0  + \beta_1 x_{1,i} + \beta_2 x_{2,i} + \epsilon_i\]
with \(y = att\_end\), \(x_1 = att\_start\), \(x_2 = liberal\), and \(\epsilon_i \sim N(0, \sigma^2)\).
